code: import Blockly from'blockly/core';import'blockly/blocks';import{pythonGenerator}from'blockly/python';Blockly.Blocks['class_create']={init:function(){this.appendValueInput('NAME').setCheck('String').appendField('create class named');this.appendStatementInput('METHODS').setCheck(null).appendField('with methods');this.setPreviousStatement(true,null);this.setNextStatement(true,null);this.setColour(160);this.setTooltip('Create a class with the given name and methods');}};pythonGenerator.forBlock['class_create']=function(block){const name=pythonGenerator.valueToCode(block,'NAME',pythonGenerator.ORDER_ATOMIC)||'MyClass';const methods=pythonGenerator.statementToCode(block,'METHODS');return`class ${name}:\n${methods}`;};
